attributes.action: Abolish MP Expenses! - "we're all in this together"
attributes.background: Increase in taxes, decrease in pay rises, £30pw cut to disabiliy, if we are infact all in this "together" surely ts time for the MPs to do their bit and pay for their own sympathy cards, moat cleaning, second home furnishings, like I have to from my £7.20ph. #nadinedorries great idea!

rejection.details:
The Government and Parliament don’t have the power over to abolish MPs expenses. Powers over MPs pay and expenses were given by Parliament to the Independent Parliamentary Standards Authority (IPSA) in 2010.

If you would like to contact IPSA, here’s how to contact them:

http://parliamentarystandards.org.uk/About%20Us/Pages/Contact-Us.aspx
